verses.roman:
dekhāila tāṅre āge catur-bhuja-rūpa
pāche śyāma-vaṁśī-mukha svakīya svarūpa

synonyms: dekhāila—showed; tāṅre—unto him; āge—at first; catur-bhuja-rūpa—the form with four hands; pāche—afterwards; śyāma—blackish; vaṁśī-mukha—with a flute to the mouth; svakīya—personal; svarūpa—form.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu first showed him the four-handed form and then appeared before him in His original form of Kṛṣṇa, with a blackish complexion and a flute to His lips.
